Key Match Events: The Indiana Pacers defeated the Chicago Bulls with a score of 129-113.
The Pacers scored 76 points in the paint, the second most the Bulls have allowed to an opponent this season.
Pre-Game Insights: Leading into the game, the Chicago Bulls were 9-6 over their previous 15 games with the 12th best defense in the NBA, allowing opponents to score just 112.1 points per 100 possessions.
